rules_text:
First strike
Viashino you control have haste
{RG}{RG}: Viashino you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Xl'thar, Viashino Hero attacks create a 2/2 red and green Viashino creature token with “When this creature attacks, it explores.”
flavor_text: [i]“My resistance is not in vain, we will reclaim our land, when the time comes.”[/i]
